head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GORMLEY, ELIZABETH A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GORMLEY, ELIZABETH A.

block.p: GORMLEY-Elizabeth A. Of Florida (formerly of Brooklyn and Elizaville, N.Y.) on August 26, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Donald J. Fond sister of the late Virginia Kilcoin. Sister-in-law of Jane Cosgrove. Loving aunt of Mary Elizabeth Woodburn, Amanda McGehee and Vincent Cosgrove. Funeral from the McManus Funeral Home, 2001 Flatbush Ave. on Friday, 9:45AM. Funeral mass 10:30AM St.Vincent Ferrer Church. Interment Calvary Cemetery. Visiting hours Friday 8-9:45AM.
